content.text:
# Draft:Chu kong international freight forwarding co.,ltd

----
Guangdong Port and Shipping Group Co., Ltd. is one of the largest provincial-level enterprises overseen by the Guangdong Provincial State-owned Assets Supervision and Administration Commission. Its subsidiary, Zhujiang Shipping Enterprises (Group) Co., Ltd., has a history of over 60 years in Hong Kong.
Guangdong Zhujiang International Freight Forwarding Co., Ltd. is the domestic general agent for Zhujiang Transit Logistics Co., Ltd., a subsidiary of Zhujiang Shipping Enterprises, and is headquartered in Guangzhou. Based in the Greater Bay Area, our company boasts an extensive transportation network in the Pearl River Delta, providing comprehensive logistics services to a wide range of clients. We are a renowned professional provider of freight forwarding and logistics services in the Pearl River Delta region, and have signed partnership agreements with shipping companies such as Maersk Line, COSCO Shipping Lines, Evergreen Marine, MSC Mediterranean Shipping Company, and Wan Hai Lines, serving routes around the world.
